name: Daniel Reeves
bio: Hello! I'm Daniel Reeves, and I'm a product designer, previously developer, previously scientist. I'm a Boston area native, and I'm currently looking for a position in user experience or product design.

as a sections.title: Designer
as a sections.text: I'm a product designer for software teams. I excel at bringing a structured and analytical approach, honed through my Ph.D. training, to bear on complex problems to find intuitive solutions and communicate them clearly to diverse audiences. I listen, think, and always advocate for the user.

as a sections.title: Scientist
as a sections.text: Through my dissertation and two post-docs, I brought multiple disciplines and points of view together to understand problems at many scales. One common thread, shared across contexts of biology, chemistry, and geophysics, was building an understanding of how molecules interact in crowded environments. For publication list, visit https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Daniel-Reeves-2.

as a sections.title: Hobbyist
as a sections.text: I enjoy building, woodworking, and gardening. I like coaxing beautiful shapes and textures from the raw natural materials of wood and soil.

additional sections.title: About this portfolio
additional sections.text: The code for this website is available on GitHub as the open-source platform WhisperWork. I built it to be easy to use for non coders, and easy to update and customize, as it is completely configurable from json files.
